CustomField.description: Don't add additional fields from Attendee to the related Contact or Lead record. Name, Salutation, and email will still be added. **Current fields included in this custom setting: Phone, Title
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Don't add additional fields from Attendee to the related Contact or Lead record. Name, Salutation, and email will still be added. **Current fields included in this custom setting: Phone, Title
CustomField.label: Disable Attendee/Contact/Lead fields
